name: Shri Yog Abhyas Ashram Trust
briefDescription: Incepted in 1888 with the birth of the First Guru Gaddi Yogeshwar Ramlal Bhagwan, the mission is now known as Shri Yog Abhyas Ashram Trust [Regd.], a non-profit organization aimed at advancing and propagating Yoga practices to spread peace in the world.  Our organization has adopted as a scientific cure to human ailments. Envisioning the concept of Yogic colleges and schools for the country’s and world’s welfare, we are continually working to bring more research works, journals, periodicals, papers and educational contents.
